field.name: summary
field.value: Some tests in MethodFinderTestCase failed because of culture specific exception messages

field.name: description
field.value:
Tests GetMethodsThrowsOnStatic and GetMethodsThrowsOnOtherFlags in MethodFinderTestCase fixture failed on platforms where the UI culture isn't English, because they expect that the exception message contains "Parameter name: flags", which is UI culture specific.
To avoid that, this patch set the current thread UI culture to "en-US".
